eeta pera paswaru 5.05 ta the panaya sandaha karaka sabhawe katayuthu athhituwimakda kara atha.wishesha karaka sabhawa katayuthu karana aakaraya pilibandawa thamanta wishwasayak nathayi agawinisuruwariya wenuwen peni sitina janadhipathi nithignya romesh da silwa mahatha prakasha kara atha.sakshikaruwange nama lekhana idiripath nokirima, chodana sambandha lipi lekhana idiripath nokirima, agawinisuruta apahasa kirima aadi karunu hethuwen thamanta saha agawinisuruwariyata wishwasayak nathayi pawasamin nithignya kandayama saha agawinisuruwariya pitawa gos thibe.nawatha mema karaka sabhawa wetha agawinisuruwariya ho nithignyawaru sahabhagi nowana bawada owun karaka sabhawa wetha danum di atha.

eheth el. ti. ti. ee. nayaka welupille prabhakaran yanu wimukthi kamiyeki.thrasthawadayata erehiwa podu loka mathayak thibiya yuthu bawata thrasthawadaya nisa dashaka gananawak pida windi shri lankawa wani ratawal eksath jathinge sanwidhanayath athuluwa sama jathyanthara wedikawakadima pahe handa nangaddi nasunu kanin, nodutu nethin ha nobinu muwin yuthuwa siti amerikawa pramukha balawath jathinta thrasthawadaye tharama therumgiye 2001 sapthambar 11 wanida niwyorkhi loka welenda madhyasthanayata ha pentaganayata ella wu alkhayida thrastha praharayath samangayi.ethek prachalithawa thibune pentaganayata ihalin kurullekutawath piyasara kala nohaki bawayi.
